text: Franco Maria Malfatti () (13 June 1927 â€“ 10 December 1991) was an Italian politician. He served as the 3rd President of the European Commission from 1970 to 1972.Discover the former Presidents: The Malfatti Commission, Europa (web portal), Accessed 23 August 2007 He served at Italian level as Italian Minister of Foreign Affairs from 1979 to 1980 and Italian Minister of Education from 1973 to 1978. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:1991 deaths Category:European Commissioners Category:Politicians from Rome
title: Franco Maria Malfatti
